title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos and Q3 2018 has the lowest Price in thousand Mexican pesos.
The lowest value at Quarter Q3 2018 is 1.34x times less than the highest value at Q1 2019.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in the y axis.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos and Q3 2018 has the lowest Price in thousand Mexican pesos.
The lowest value at Quarter Q3 2018 is 1.34x times less than the highest value at Q1 2019.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in the y axis.
Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos and Q3 2018 has the lowest Price in thousand Mexican pesos.
The highest value at Quarter Q1 2019 is 1.34x times more than the lowest value at Q3 2018.
Price in thousand Mexican pesos at Quarter Q1 2019 is 1071.24 , second place is Q2 2019 at 1070.65, and thirdly is Q2 2018 at 815.93.
Overall Price in thousand Mexican pesos has reduced over the Quarters.
The highest value 1071.24 at Q1 2019 is almost 1.2 times larger than the average value 895.62.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is 5373.75 if we add up values of all Quarters.
